methods.javadoc:
Format an array of PcodeOp objects as a multi-line String
@return pcode listing as a String
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Format an array of PcodeOp objects as a multi-line String

methods.name: toAttributedStrings
methods.comment:
Format an array of PcodeOp objects as a two-dimensional list of AttributedString objects.
 The returned list contains a separate element for each row of the pcode listing.

return.comment: pcode listing as a two-dimensional list of AttributedString objects

methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Format an array of pcode OpTpl objects as a multi-line String

methods.name: toAttributedStrings
methods.comment:
Format an array of pcode OpTpl objects as a list of AttributedString objects.
 The returned list contains a separate element for each row of the pcode listing.

return.comment: pcode listing as a two-dimensional list of AttributedString objects

methods.name: getPcodeOpTemplates
methods.comment: Convert flattened PcodeOp's into pcode operation templates.
